INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(./)
FILE(GLOB SRCS FALSE *.c *.cpp *.h)
SET(TINYXML_SRCS ${SRCS})
ADD_LIBRARY(tinyxml STATIC ${TINYXML_SRCS})
set_target_properties(tinyxml PROPERTIES FOLDER extlibs/)
SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES(tinyxml PROPERTIES LINKER_LANGUAGE CXX)
INSTALL(TARGETS tinyxml
  	RUNTIME DESTINATION "bin"
		ARCHIVE DESTINATION "lib"
  	LIBRARY DESTINATION "lib")


SET(TINYXML_INCLUDE_DIR "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}" CACHE INTERNAL "" FORCE)
SET(TINYXML_LIBRARY tinyxml                           CACHE INTERNAL "" FORCE)
